name: 1password
description: Password manager with end-to-end encryption and cross-platform support for password generation and passkey support.

name: 1password-cli
description: Command-line tool for 1Password to eliminate plaintext secrets in code and automate tasks with biometric auth.

name: @clevercloud/random-labels
description: Tool that randomizes and displays labels in a suspenseful sequential manner with clipboard support.

name: baobab
description: GNOME disk usage analyzer scanning folders and devices presenting findings through tree and graphical views.

name: bat
description: A cat clone with syntax highlighting and Git integration displaying file contents with beautiful coloring.

name: brotli
description: General-purpose lossless compression combining LZ77 variant and Huffman coding with better ratios than alternatives.

name: bun
description: Fast all-in-one JavaScript toolkit combining runtime package manager bundler and test runner.

name: chromium
description: Open-source browser project building a safer faster and more stable web experience providing code for Chrome.

name: claude-code
description: Agentic coding tool in your terminal that understands your codebase and helps you code faster via natural language.

name: curl
description: Command-line tool for transferring data using URLs supporting HTTP HTTPS FTP SFTP and many protocols.

name: deno
description: Open-source JavaScript runtime for the modern web with built-in TypeScript support security and tooling.

name: emoj
description: Find relevant emoji from text on command-line using local database without internet connection.

name: epiphany
description: Simple clean GNOME browser with integrated privacy protections including ad blocker and tracking prevention.

name: evince
description: GNOME document viewer for PDF PostScript and other document formats with search and annotations.

name: extension-manager
description: Utility for browsing and installing GNOME Shell Extensions directly from extensions.gnome.org.

name: ffmpeg
description: Complete cross-platform solution to record convert and stream audio and video between formats.

name: fish
description: Smart user-friendly shell with syntax highlighting autosuggest-as-you-type and automatic tab completions.

name: fprint
description: Linux fingerprint reader support providing libfprint library and fprintd daemon for unified authentication.

name: fzf
description: General-purpose interactive command-line fuzzy finder for files history processes and git commits.

name: gh
description: GitHub CLI bringing pull requests issues and repository management directly into your terminal alongside git.

name: ghostty
description: Fast feature-rich native cross-platform terminal emulator with multi-window tabbing and splits.

name: gimp
description: Cross-platform image editor providing free and open-source sophisticated image manipulation capabilities.
